name: VideoCrisp
tag_list: video, cloud, video-creation, video-editing, content-creation-software, video-editing-software, video-creation-software
overview:
VideoCrisp is a cloud based video creation software that allows agencies, businesses and marketers to create professional videos with just a few clicks on their browsers.

VideoCrisp offers an incredibly easy to use tool on browsers for users to create effective, high-quality and content-rich videos using just a few lines of a message. Users can simply type their key messages, select digital-media content such as animations, backgrounds, music etc and can preview, publish & share these video on the web in just a few minutes.
